description:
A simple, secure, decentralized VPN mesh network solution


This is a bugfix version.
- add command easytier-cli proxy to show tcp/kcp proxy entries by @KKRainbow in https://github.com/EasyTier/EasyTier/pull/610
- fix subnet to subnet kcp proxy by @KKRainbow in https://github.com/EasyTier/EasyTier/pull/612
- update kcp-sys to fix unexpected disconnect by @KKRainbow in https://github.com/EasyTier/EasyTier/pull/613
- fix tcp proxy not close properly by @KKRainbow in https://github.com/EasyTier/EasyTier/pull/615
- fix gui label translate by @KKRainbow in https://github.com/EasyTier/EasyTier/pull/616
Full Changelog: https://github.com/EasyTier/EasyTier/compare/v2.2.1...v2.2.2
